name.japanese: インペルダウン レベル4 焦熱地獄

description: Level 4 of Impel Down prison, known as Blazing Hell, characterized by its extreme heat from a massive pool of boiling blood. This level serves as the setting for the confrontation between Luffy and Blackbeard.

keyEvents.title: Blackbeard Reveals He Captured Ace
keyEvents.description: Blackbeard reveals to Luffy on Level 4 that he captured Ace and turned him over to the World Government.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Luffy learns the truth about who is responsible for Ace's predicament.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Blackbeard Battle Begins
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Blackbeard engage in their first physical confrontation on Level 4.
keyEvents.significance: First direct combat between the two rivals for Pirate King.

keyEvents.title: Magellan Poisons Blackbeard Pirates
keyEvents.description: Magellan catches up to and poisons the entire Blackbeard Pirates crew on Level 4.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Magellan's overwhelming power and the danger of challenging Impel Down's chief warden.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Defeats Revived Minotaurus
keyEvents.description: Luffy easily defeats the revived Minotaurus Jailer Beast on Level 4.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Luffy's power growth during the prison break.

statusHistory.reason: Major confrontations and battles taking place during the prison break

name.japanese: インペルダウン レベル1 紅蓮地獄

description: Level 1 of Impel Down prison, known as Crimson Hell, the uppermost level of the prison characterized by a forest of blade-like grass and trees. Prisoners who escape here are close to freedom.

keyEvents.title: Buggy and Mr. 3 Reach Level 1
keyEvents.description: Buggy and Mr. 3 successfully reach Level 1 with a group of prisoners, getting closer to escape.
keyEvents.significance: Represents significant progress in the prison break as escapees reach the uppermost level.

statusHistory.reason: Escapees reaching this level during the mass prison break
